overview:
Helena Rebane directs Moogo’s sales program. She sets sales goals, measures the sales, contacts potential customers, follows leads, identifies potential target groups and how to obtain expected quotas and reach set goals.

Her job description expands beyond her sales role. She also contributes to Moogo’s social media efforts as an evangelist who’s constantly blogging and twittering away and keeping in touch with our customers. Additionally she monitors Moogo’s stats and occasionally creates fun office events, like the pacifist-friendly murder mystery game.

Helena herself hails from Estonia; a country most known for having two independence days. Prior to Moogo, she worked as the President of the Finnish branch of the world’s largest student association, AIESEC.
